translation: But the Yogi who strives assiduously, purified of sins and perfected gradually over many births, reaches the highest goal.
commentary: 6.45 effort with assiduity? trying striving? You but? Yogi the Yogi? purified from sins? Anekjanmasansiddhah perfected through many births? Then then? Yati reaches? Param the highest? Gatim path.Commentary He gains experiences little by little in the course of many births and eventually attains to perfection. Then he attains the knowledge of the Self and attains to the final beatitude of life.
